name: Dragonflat
description:
Dragonflat is a 2 player fighting game, where your goal is to be the last one alive!

Also it's my Third Game Ever, created In Unity(=

Screen Resolution (recommend) : 1920x1080

Enjoy!

Keys >

  • Movement -> (W, A, D, shift) and (I, J, l, period or rshift or H or B)
  • Attack -> (S) and (K)
  • Debugging mode -> T

Credits (Thank you all)>

  • Kin Ng -> Knight and Dragon sprites
  • Cainos -> Map 2
  • Ansimuz -> Map 1 and 3

Notes >

  • There were very cool scene transitions, but Unity's animator and SceneManager were so glitchy that without them, the game looked better haha. Or I'm bad idk.
  • I'm going to try Animancer for my next game, I'll see if I like it.
